main event: A Washington fire department observed a UFO after a small aircraft accident on August 22, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as having a double bright flasher and made of bright white material., The UFO was approximately 200 feet long and appeared to hover., The object reportedly accelerated away at an estimated speed of 2000 mph., Another sighting occurred on July 9, 1964, where a brilliant incandescent sphere was observed in Roxbury, New York., Observers noted that the sphere was about 30 to 35 feet in diameter and hovered 75 feet above the ground before disappearing.
sighted object: bright white UFO and a brilliant incandescent sphere
witness description: Washington fire department and observers in Roxbury, New York
